Text: No problem. That'll be available by tomorrow latest.
is it possible to do Captain America, Coana, and Hangover II??
Yes, I will definately convert these once there is a decent source available (providing no one else does). I don't convert PPVRips/TS/Cam.
how about a copy without any subs?
Once a version is available, then yes, possibly I will do another upload without subs. However, the only ones I've seen are the cropped versions.

HolyRoses has a 2GB+ high-def blu ray rip of this movie. You could recompile his into a smaller size for iPods. I could do it for myself, but I hate downloading things that big on my connection. And I'm pretty sure his is good quality, with no subs. He is HolyRoses, after all :)
